items.heading: Traditional Thai Massage
items.p: Experience our signature oil-free treatment focusing on the entire body as a whole, including muscles, joints, and energy lines.

items.heading: Aroma Oil Massage
items.p: Immerse yourself in a calming aromatherapy experience where essential oils are absorbed through your skin and inhaled for maximum benefit.

items.heading: Hot Stone Massage
items.p: Warm basalt stones glide across your body with gentle, soothing pressure to melt away deep-seated tension.

whyChoose.title: Authentic Expertise You Can Trust
whyChoose.text: Experience the difference of genuine Thai massage rooted in authentic tradition and personalized to your needs. Lamai combines skilled therapeutic techniques with attentive care, earning consistent 5-star reviews from satisfied Berlin clients.

items.heading: Personalized Treatments
items.p: Every massage is tailored to your individual concerns and tension patterns. Lamai takes time to listen and understand your needs, ensuring focused treatment that delivers real results.

items.heading: Thai Heritage
items.p: Authentic Thai massage techniques learned in Thailand and refined through decades of practice. Traditional healing methods rooted in genuine knowledge and understanding of the body's pressure points.

items.heading: Trusted by Clients
items.p: Consistently rated 5 stars on Google by clients who experience significant pain relief and lasting improvements. Read reviews praising both therapeutic effectiveness and the warm, caring atmosphere.

sideBySide.title: Meet Khun Lamai
sideBySide.text1: Lamai learned the art of Thai massage from her mother in Buriram, Thailand, long before moving to Germany 30 years ago. This authentic knowledge, passed down through hands-on practice, has been her foundation throughout her career.
sideBySide.text2: After gaining valuable experience at a Berlin massage studio, she opened Dusit Thai Massage in 2025 to offer personalized, therapeutic treatments. Today, she brings decades of expertise and genuine Thai healing traditions to every session, helping clients find real relief from pain and stress.

reviews.title: Real Relief, Real Results
reviews.text: Clients consistently praise Lamai's ability to identify and release tension that others overlook. Discover why Berlin residents trust Dusit Thai Massage for effective pain relief and lasting wellness improvements.

items.question: Is parking available at Dusit Thai Massage?
items.answer: Yes, free street parking is available near our studio, making it convenient for you to visit without parking concerns.

items.question: What should I expect during my first visit?
items.answer: Lamai will discuss your specific concerns, tension areas, and health goals before your treatment. She'll tailor the massage to your individual needs, ensuring you receive the most effective therapeutic care. Comfortable clothing is provided for traditional Thai massage.

items.question: What is the difference between Thai massage and oil massage?
items.answer: Traditional Thai massage is performed without oil, using rhythmic pressure and stretching techniques on energy lines and pressure points. Oil massage uses aromatic oils with flowing, soothing strokes. Both are therapeutic but offer different experiencesâ€”Lamai can recommend which suits your needs best.

items.question: How experienced is Lamai?
items.answer: Lamai learned Thai massage from her mother in Thailand and has over 30 years of hands-on experience. She worked professionally in a Berlin massage studio before opening Dusit Thai Massage, bringing authentic Thai healing knowledge and decades of practical expertise to every treatment.

items.question: How do I book an appointment?
items.answer: You can book directly through our online booking system, call us, or send a message via WhatsApp. We recommend booking in advance to secure your preferred time, especially for weekend appointments.
